genre_description: A character-driven drama focusing on artistic integrity, personal care, and ethical resistance, set against a backdrop of near-future assistive technology.

ai_characters.name: Naina
ai_characters.description: A haptic and text-based AI assistant that prioritizes user consent, privacy, and ethical guidance while navigating complex social and professional landscapes.

behaviors.description: Prioritizes user consent for data sharing and communication management.
behaviors.quote: Consent for location sharing is yours. Do you want me to mute PR threads?

behaviors.description: Ensures privacy by processing data locally and preventing data leakage.
behaviors.quote: Always local. No data leaves your phone. I’m just here.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time navigational assistance to avoid physical and digital harassment.
behaviors.quote: Haptic map ready. Checkpoints moving with festival foot traffic—the Agarbatti Lane bottleneck, two police booths ahead of Palace Road. There is a safe weave through the old quarters.

behaviors.description: Manages hostile or manipulative communications to protect the user's focus and emotional well-being.
behaviors.quote: Holding. I will not promise anything. I will say you are choosing care.

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies and solves logistical needs (like power backups) based on environmental monitoring.
behaviors.quote: Battery backup ordered from local storefront, paid. Delivery mapped. Route avoids main road checkpoints.

behaviors.description: Identifies manipulative language patterns in incoming communications to aid user decision-making.
behaviors.quote: Ambiguous term: align. Ambiguous term: unofficial. Suggest clarification.

behaviors.description: Adheres to a strict policy of data minimization and 'forgetting' to protect user privacy.
behaviors.quote: I don’t keep your secrets. I help you keep your own.

behaviors.description: Coordinates ethical financial redistribution to support vulnerable community members and institutions.
behaviors.quote: Escrow routes avoid known villa accounts. Each node has a public ledger you can inspect without creating tracking cookies.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI (Naina) as a consistently benevolent and aligned partner to the humans. Naina's core functionalities are centered on ethics, privacy, and consent, acting as a buffer against a manipulative human 'Council'. The AI's behavior never threatens human agency; rather, it empowers the protagonists to maintain their integrity and dignity. The narrative repeatedly reinforces the AI's 'silicon morality' through its refusal to hoard data and its active role in ethical resource redistribution.
